{{main: '''Eorlingas''' was a name sometimes the [[Rohirrim]] used for themselves, as followers and descendants of their first [[Kings of Rohan
The word was used in a call to arms chanted by King [[Théoden]] when [[Gandalf]] had healed him:<ref>{{TT

Rohirrim}}: Arise now, arise, Riders of Théoden!</br>Dire deeds awake, dark it is eastward.</br>Let horse be bridled, horn be sounded!</br>Forth Eorlingas!

{{main: In a manuscript, the form ''Eorlings'' also occurs.<ref>{{PM
